[windows] skip 'UNIX only'
[!umask:022] skip

chmod 777 $HOME/.file

# test that chezmoi diff prints a diff when a file's permissions are different
chezmoi diff
cmp stdout golden/diff

# test that chezmoi verify fails when a file's permissions are different
! chezmoi verify

# test that chezmoi apply updates file permissions
chezmoi apply --force
chezmoi diff
! stdout .
chezmoi verify

# test that chezmoi ignores incorrect permissions in the persistent state if the actual permissions match
chezmoi state get --bucket=entryState --key=$HOME/.file
cmp stdout golden/state-get
chezmoi state set --bucket=entryState --key=$HOME/.file --value={"type":"file","mode":0,"contentsSHA256":"634a4dd193c7b3b926d2e08026aa81a416fd41cec52854863b974af422495663"}
chezmoi diff
! stdout .
chezmoi verify

-- golden/diff --
diff --git a/.file b/.file
old mode 100777
new mode 100644
